enb_long_title: UNFCCC Workshop on innovative options for financing the development and transfer of technologies
sentences: The workshops second session, which was held on Tuesday, 28 September, consisted of two segments.
The first focused on 'development finance in practice,' with four speakers providing insights and case studies on the subject.
This was followed by a question-and-answer period.
The second part of the session examined barriers and lessons learned in relation to financing, focusing in particular on case studies from Ghana and China.
